data.title: Did Rihanna & A$AP Rocky Get Married In Secret?
meta_keywords: Did Rihanna & A$AP Rocky Get Married In Secret?
data.meta_description: Speculation rose that the couple may already be married, although no confirmation of a secret marriage has been made | iHeart
data.text:
During a concert at the 2023 “Cannes Lions Festival,” A$AP Rocky surprised everyone by referring to Rihanna as his "beautiful wife." Specifically, A$AP addressed the crowd “I’d like to dedicate this song to my beautiful wife in the motherf***** building!”

This has sparked speculation that the couple may already be married…but no one’s confirmed any secret marriage yet. Rihanna was in the audience showing off her baby bump enjoying the music with friends from the balcony. The couple keeping their marriage secret wouldn’t be a huge surprise, considering they kept the name of their son RZA secret for almost a year!
